props.name: scroll
props.description: Makes the header scroll with the content

props.name: fixedDrawer
props.description: Makes the drawer always visible and open in larger screens

props.name: fixedHeader
props.description: Makes the header always visible, even in small screens

props.name: noDrawerButton
props.description: Does not display a drawer button

props.name: noDesktopDrawerButton
props.description: Does not display a drawer button in desktop mode

props.name: waterfall
props.description: Allows a "waterfall" effect with multiple header lines

props.name: waterfallHideTop
props.description: Hides the top rather than the bottom rows on a waterfall header

props.name: transparent
props.description: Makes header transparent (draws on top of layout background)

props.name: seamed
props.description: Uses a header without a shadow

props.name: fixedTabs
props.description: Uses fixed tabs instead of the default scrollable tabs

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the layout content and can contain HTML

slots.name: header-left
slots.description: The left section of the header

slots.name: header-center
slots.description: The center section of the header

slots.name: header-right
slots.description: The right section of the header

slots.name: header-bottom
slots.description: The bottom section of the header

slots.name: drawer-top
slots.description: The top section of the drawer

slots.name: drawer-bottom
slots.description: The bottom section of the drawer

slots.name: footer-inner
slots.description: The inner section of the footer

slots.name: footer-outer
slots.description: The outer section of the footer
